The yoga intervention consist three treatment component : 1 ) in-person group yoga teach certify yoga therapist ; 2 ) relaxation audio record home-use ; 3 ) DVD record reinforce concept teach in-person yoga session . Patients randomize structured exercise program ( SEP ) arm participate 12-week exercise program deliver group/class format supervise fitness instructor .
